EmailTemplate.subject: New Partner Portal functionality goes live August 27
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Partners,
This important notification is to inform you about an upcoming Portal maintenance outage that will make way for new functionality that Nokia will make available beginning 27 August 2018. What’s the news? The Partner Portal will be unavailable this Friday 24 August through Sunday August 26. Local times and dates are listed below. Outage Start: 23-AUG 23:30 Central Daylight Time 24-AUG 06:30 Central European Summer Time 24-AUG 10:00 India Standard Time Outage End: 26-AUG 17:30 Central Daylight Time 27-AUG 00:30 Central European Summer Time 27-AUG 4:00 India Standard Time Benefits: The outage will allow Nokia to introduce new functionality designed to improve your experience and further consolidate our tools into a single easy to access platform:
- The Nokia Co-op platform will be fully integrated into our Salesforce based Portal, easing access to and management of funds - Introduction of Task Management provides auto-creation and assignment of shared tasks between Nokia and our partners - Expanded Nokia Indirect Reseller Application (NIRA) allows partners to apply to sell in multiple countries via a single application, simplifying the application and compliance approval process
Updated Portal Training Updated training will be made available on the Partner Portal on Monday August 27. As a reminder, you can access the Portal training from within the Portal. From the Main menu, simply go to Topics>PRM Training <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/article/PRM-Training-PRM]]>.
